hero.title: Deal closing
hero.description: For startups and scale-ups, securing investment is often a make-or-break moment. Yet, many founders find themselves navigating this critical process without the expertise it demands.

feature1.title: navigating complexity
feature1.description: we help making the legal complexities and strategic nuances manageable

feature2.title: risk mitigation
feature2.description: with our support you're more likely to avoid costly mistakes, safeguard your company against future pitfalls and ensure regulatory compliance

feature3.title: strategic alignment
feature3.description: we ensure that the terms of investment align with the startup's long-term vision and goals

steps.label: Initial consultation
list: identifying potential legal and strategic challenges.

steps.label: Deal refinement
list: reviewing & advising on standard and negotiable terms, ensuring alignement of the long-term goals

steps.label: Negotiation support
list: providing expertise in addressing investor objections, value-based closing techniques, investor psychology & balancing demands.

steps.label: Closing coordination
list: support setting closing timeline, coordinating communication between company counsel, lead investor, and other participants

steps.label: Post-closing support
list: advising on implementing any new governance structures.

content.title: Streamlined process
content.description: You get a faster and more efficient deal-closing process, with expert management of administrative tasks and real-time visibility into your financing round.

content.title: Risk protection
content.description: You benefit from risk mitigation strategies that minimize errors and misaligned expectations, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and safeguarding your company's interests.

content.title: Expert Guidance
content.description: You receive seasoned expertise to navigate complex negotiations and legal intricacies, ensuring you secure optimal terms and avoid costly mistakes.

content.title: Strategic opportunities
content.description: You gain access to strategic partnerships that unlock valuable industry connections, potential customers, and top talent, propelling your venture forward beyond just securing capital.
